text: Pavetta kupensis is a species of plant in the family Rubiaceae. It is endemic to Cameroon. Its natural habitat is subtropical or tropical moist montane forests. ==Sources== * Cheek. M. 2004. Pavetta kupensis. 2006 IUCN Red List of Threatened Species. Downloaded on 23 August 2007. Category:Flora of Cameroon kupensis Category:Critically endangered plants Category:Taxonomy articles created by Polbot
title: Pavetta kupensis
